bug.author: scimad
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
OpenCV => 4.1.0 Operating System / Platform => Ubuntu 18.04 64 Bit Compiler => 7.4.0
<denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
The error message for unsupported SeamFinder type on function SeamFinder::createDefault(int type) in stitching/src/seam_finders.cpp seems is misleading. Seems to be copied from ExposureCompensator::createDefault(int type) at stitching/src/exposure_compensate.cpp.

comments.comment: It seems like an easy first issue. If there is no open PR, can I please take this one?
